title: Can't launch League of Legends
body: It just has the lauch icon in grey and to the right it says unavailable.

replies.body: There may be a settings or security issue that's blocking the patcher from loading.  I recommend going over our  [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is allowed.  This should do the trick!
Exact same problem here. I tried everything, most guides say it's Avast antivirus but I don't even use Avast.
